title: Bryce Canyon National Park: Yovimpa Pass Campsite
body: Yovimpa Pass Campsite       This site is on the Riggs Spring Loop 1.6 miles (2.6 km) from Rainbow Point. There is reliable water in the stream below the pumphouse that is just below the campsite. There are Aspens, Ponderosa Pines and Blue Spruce at the site as well as good views of the pink cliffs and out into the Grand Staircase. Datum WGS 84, 37 27 46.9 N, 112 15 28.8 W. Altitude 8334 feet (2540 m).  Â     Yovimpa Campsite and view from Yovimpa Point text and images courtesy of Ron Warner
